## ExtraAttrsObject interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtraAttrsObject 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [default](./core-types.extraattrsobject.default.md) | <code>string &#124; null</code> | The default value for the attr, if left undefined then this becomes a required. and must be provided whenever a node or mark of a type that has them is created. |
|  [getAttrs](./core-types.extraattrsobject.getattrs.md) | <code>(domNode: Node) =&gt; unknown</code> | A function used to extract the attribute from the dom. |
|  [name](./core-types.extraattrsobject.name.md) | <code>string</code> | The name of the attribute |
